main.name: Dirga Putra Cahaya
main.description: Totally passionate to write codes that impactful to the society.
main.bio: My cooperative, friendly and helpful attitude makes me a trusted team member. At the same time, thanks to my independent nature, I also enjoy focusing on my work alone. Because of my curious and broad-minded approach, I am always open to new ideas and experimentation.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Develop a software to handle the transaction that happen in daily basis and produce a detailed report of the transaction.

work.title: Business Owner
work.description: Set up a cyber cafe that focused on customers comfort. Provide a high quality PC and food to fulfill high-end customers demand on playing online games using high spec PC gaming at a cozy place with outstanding beverages.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Update old code bases to modern development standars using Microsoft .NET C# Framework, also improving some functionalities.

projects.title: Face Recognition
projects.category: Small project to recognize faces from a picture. Still on progress, 80% done.

projects.title: robofriends
projects.category: Fun project to generate a robot based on name.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
